name: playwright-e2e-framework
description: Modular and maintainable Playwright UI and API automation framework

scripts.docker:test: docker build --build-arg TEST_CMD='npm run test' -t pw-tests . && docker run --rm -e CI=true -v $(pwd)/reports/docker-reports:/app/reports/playwright-report pw-tests
scripts.docker:test:api: docker build --build-arg TEST_CMD='npm run test:api' -t pw-tests . && docker run --rm -e CI=true -v $(pwd)/reports/docker-reports:/app/reports/playwright-report pw-tests
scripts.docker:test:ui: docker build --build-arg TEST_CMD='npm run test:ui' -t pw-tests . && docker run --rm -e CI=true -v $(pwd)/reports/docker-reports:/app/reports/playwright-report pw-tests

author: Hanna Arkhipchuk
